description:
Jude showed up for this shoot after spending the previous day surfing and partying at the beach.
I didn't realize how sunburned the boy's ass was until later in the shoot.
Lee is a versatile kind of guy, and we started off by him fucking the heck out of Jude. Jude loves to get fucked, that's for sure, but he is also a great top, and I love flip-flop vids. We did one scene with Jude fucking Lee, but it kept distracting me.
It's obvious Jude must have had his board shorts hangin REALLY low when he was partying, so you just know he was showin' off his ass A LOT at the beach. That boy sure does like to show it off!
Anyway, Lee was eager to take on a straight guy (Lee didn't believe Jude was straight until he actually met him) and the cumshot on this video rocks!
title: Jude & Lee - Wrapped
